recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the mixture.
Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt; mix into the creamed mixture.
Mix in the chocolate chips.
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans.
Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Pasta
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and saute onions until translucent.
Add garlic and tomatoes, cook until tomatoes are tender.
Stir in chopped basil and season with salt and pepper.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the tomato mixture.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.

recipes.title: Chicken Teriyaki
steps: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey, ginger, garlic, and sesame oil.
Marinate the chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour.
In a skillet, cook chicken until golden brown on both sides.
Add the marinade to the skillet and bring to boil.
Mix cornstarch with a little water and add to the skillet to thicken the sauce.
Sprinkle sesame seeds and garnish with green onions before serving.

recipes.title: Huevos Rancheros
steps: Heat tortillas in a skillet until warm and slightly crispy.
Cook eggs to preference (usually sunny side up).
Place each egg on a tortilla and spoon ranchero sauce over the top.
Top with avocado slices, feta cheese, and cilantro.
Serve with a wedge of lime.

recipes.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
steps: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, and cornstarch with a bit of water to make the sauce.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add garlic, ginger, and onion, stir-fry until fragrant.
Add beef and stir-fry until it begins to brown.
Add broccoli and continue to cook until vegetables are tender.
Pour the prepared sauce over the beef and broccoli, stir well until the sauce thickens.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve hot.

recipes.title: Classic French Crepes
steps: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour and the eggs.
Gradually add in the milk and water, stirring to combine.
Add the salt and butter; beat until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each crepe.
Tilt the pan with a circular motion so that the batter coats the surface evenly.
Cook the crepe for about 2 minutes, until the bottom is light brown. Flip and cook the other side.
Serve hot with your choice of toppings.

recipes.title: Lamb Rogan Josh
steps: Heat ghee in a large pot over medium heat.
Add cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, and bay leaf. Sauté for a minute.
Add onions, garlic, and ginger. Cook until onions are golden.
Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and paprika. Stir well.
Add lamb and brown all sides.
Pour in tomato puree and yogurt. Mix well until combined.
Add water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1 hour or until lamb is tender.
Stir in garam masala and season with salt.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and chili, sauté for a minute until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until brown.
Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, and sugar until well combined.
Add Thai basil and cook until wilted.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

recipes.title: New York Style Cheesecake
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 cup sugar, and melted butter. Press onto the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese with 1 1/4 cups sugar in a large bowl until smooth. Mix in sour cream and vanilla.
Add eggs one at a time, beating just until blended. Pour over crust.
Bake in preheated oven for 50 minutes.
Turn oven off and let cake cool in oven with the door ajar for 1 hour.
Chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours.
Serve with whipped cream or fruit topping.
